Bill.title: An Act to amend the Customs Tariff (goods from Xinjiang)
Bill.shortTitle: Xinjiang Manufactured Goods Importation Prohibition Act
Bill.currentStatus: At second reading in the Senate

section.title: Short Title
section.paragraph: 1. This Act may be cited as the Xinjiang Manufactured Goods Importation Prohibition Act.

section.title: Customs Tariff
section.paragraph: 2. The Customs Tariff is amended by adding the following after section 136:

subsection.title: Prohibited Imports
subsection.paragraph: 136.1 Despite anything in this Act, the importation of goods manufactured or produced wholly or in part in the Xinjiang Uyghur Autonomous Region of the People's Republic of China is prohibited.
